column2: "Okay, now that I have your report, you've cleared all the conditions and passed the test."
"I hereby grant you, <%me>, permission to select the Techer class."
"Now then, let me give you some advice. The use of a new class gives you more options in combat, it's true."
"But don't get cocky. All it really means is there's more that you can do. It doesn't mean that you've become more formidable."
"Don't forget that. After all, there's only one of you, and we'd hate to lose you."
"Techers are a class skilled in support actions. While the techs of the Force class are more attack-oriented, those of the Techer class tend to be more for supporting roles."
"This class features enhanced effect and range for support and recovery Techniques, including improved Heal recovery and an added critical effect to Shifta."
